42 #include "Teuchos_MPISession.hpp"
43 #include "Teuchos_Assert.hpp"
44 
45 using namespace Teuchos;
46 
47 int MPISession::rank_ = 0 ;
48 int MPISession::nProc_ = 1 ;
49 
50 void MPISession::init(int* argc, void*** argv)
51 {
52 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
53  /* initialize MPI */
54  int mpiHasBeenStarted = 0;
55  MPI_Initialized(& mpiHasBeenStarted);
56  int mpierr = 0 ;
57  if (!mpiHasBeenStarted)
58  {
59  mpierr = ::MPI_Init (argc, (char ***) argv);
60  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error,
61  "Error code=" << mpierr
62  << " detected in MPI_Init()");
63  }
64 
65  /* find rank */
66  mpierr = ::MPI_Comm_rank (MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank_);
67  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error,
68  "Error code=" << mpierr
69  << " detected in MPI_Comm_rank()");
70 
71  /* find number of procs */
72  mpierr = ::MPI_Comm_size (MPI_COMM_WORLD, &nProc_);
73 
74  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error,
75  "Error code=" << mpierr
76  << " detected in MPI_Comm_size()");
77 
78  /* get machine name */
79  int nameLen;
80  char procName[MPI_MAX_PROCESSOR_NAME];
81  mpierr = ::MPI_Get_processor_name(procName,&nameLen);
82 
83  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error,
84  "Error code=" << mpierr
85  << " detected in MPI_Get_processor_name()");
86 
87  if (showStartupMessage())
88  {
89  std::cerr << "Teuchos::MPISession::init() started processor "
90  << procName << std::endl;
91  }
92  else
93  {
94 #else
95  std::cerr << "Teuchos::MPISession::init() started serial run" << std::endl;
96 #endif
97 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
98  }
99 #endif
100 }
101 
102 void MPISession::finalize()
103 {
104 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
105  int mpierr = ::MPI_Finalize();
106 
107  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(mpierr != 0, std::runtime_error,
108  "Error code=" << mpierr << " detected in MPI_Finalize()");
109 #endif
110 }

TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION
#define TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(throw_exception_test, Exception, msg)
Macro for throwing an exception with breakpointing to ease debugging.
Definition: Teuchos_TestForException.hpp:167
Teuchos
The Teuchos namespace contains all of the classes, structs and enums used by Teuchos, as well as a number of utility routines.
